Refer Rule 7 (1) of The National Highways (Fee for the of use National Highways Section and Permanent Bridge- Public Funded Project) Rules;, 1997, and this office circular nos. 26, 33 and 36, of 2003 and 92 of 2007 . 2. As per the "bid  referred rules & circulars , the vehicle registration no. is to be recorded for all vehicles crossing the toll plaza be it single multiple pass holders or exempt vehicles. In the case of manual ticketing, the vehicle registration no is to be recorded in the register prescribed for the purpose and also both on the ticket as well as the counter foil, In the case of  computerised ticketing, the TC is to in the registration number details before printing the ticket s0 that while the customer has the toll ticket with registration number and the toll data base has the registration number recorded. 3 The above mandatory requirement is not only essential from the view point of monitoring the efficiency of the toll collection system but is also an important source of information and provides vital clues to the law enforcement agencies in their investigation. 4 Post recent unfortunate incident of serial blasts in Ahmedabad, Times of India, Ahmedabad edition has carried a news items titled "HIGHWAY TOLL BOOTHS DONT CARE FOR RECORDS" and "TOLL BOOTH FINALLY START NOTING REGISTRATION NOs" copies enclosed for ready reference. 5_ It is reiterated that noting of the vehicle registration number of all vehicles crossing the toll plaza is a legal requirement  It is mandatory for all toll collection agencies to ensure that there is no compromise on this requirement  All Supervision agencies ie , vicmi(coxincmicomreed Maccane Inhov filoc DalicrontollDolicu on toll (Vol YIT Onnr Aoc NHAI Aug: entry , entry , key
